item.description:
Calling all fans of Doctor Who and New Who! A wonderful weekend of double features at the Brattle. I wish I could see them all! 

I look forward to THE DOCTOR’S WIFE, written by acclaimed novelist (and geek fave) Neil Gaiman. For this the Sunday feature, let's meet at the food court in The Garage by 9 pm and walk over to the Brattle together. I'll be carrying a meetup sign. It's $8; buy your tickets ahead of time online... click here for details:

http://brattlefilm.org/2011/06/12/the-eleventh-hour-the-doctors-wife/
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at The Garage food court
item.name: Doctor Who - Double feature Sunday
